actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education.

official_title: A bill to name the post-baccalaureate achievement program under subpart 4 of part A of title IV of the Higher Education Act of 1965 as the "Ronald E. McNair Post-Baccalaureate Achievement Program".

summary.text: Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to name a post-baccalaureate achievement program as the Ronald E. McNair Post-Baccalaureate Achievement Program.

titles.title: A bill to name the post-baccalaureate achievement program under subpart 4 of part A of title IV of the Higher Education Act of 1965 as the "Ronald E. McNair Post-Baccalaureate Achievement Program".
